接口的使用
org.springframework.web.server.session.WebSessionManager

  • 使用WebSessionManager的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.mock.web.server
    Mock implementations of Spring's reactive server web API abstractions.
    org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
    Support for testing Spring WebFlux server endpoints via WebTestClient.
    org.springframework.web.server.adapter
    Implementations to adapt to the underlying org.springframework.http.client.reactive reactive HTTP adapter and HttpHandler.
    org.springframework.web.server.session
    Auxiliary interfaces and implementation classes for WebSession support.

    • org.springframework.mock.web.server中WebSessionManager的使用

      参数类型为WebSessionManager的org.springframework.mock.web.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MockServerWebExchange.Builder MockServerWebExchange.Builder.sessionManager(WebSessionManager sessionManager)
      Provide a WebSessionManager instance to use with the exchange.

    • org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server中WebSessionManager的使用

      参数类型为WebSessionManager的org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T extends B>
      T      		 WebTestClient.MockServerSpec.webSessionManager(WebSessionManager sessionManager)
      Provide a session manager instance for the mock server.

    • org.springframework.web.server.adapter中WebSessionManager的使用

      返回WebSessionManager的org.springframework.web.server.adapter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      WebSessionManager HttpWebHandlerAdapter.getSessionManager()
      Return the configured WebSessionManager.
      参数类型为WebSessionManager的org.springframework.web.server.adapter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      WebHttpHandlerBuilder WebHttpHandlerBuilder.sessionManager(WebSessionManager manager)
      Configure the WebSessionManager to set on the WebServerExchange.
      void HttpWebHandlerAdapter.setSessionManager(WebSessionManager sessionManager)
      Configure a custom WebSessionManager to use for managing web sessions.
      参数类型为WebSessionManager的org.springframework.web.server.adapter中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DefaultServerWebExchange(ServerHttpRequest request, ServerHttpResponse response, WebSessionManager sessionManager, ServerCodecConfigurer codecConfigurer, LocaleContextResolver localeContextResolver) 

    • org.springframework.web.server.session中WebSessionManager的使用

      实现WebSessionManager的org.springframework.web.server.session中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultWebSessionManager
      Default implementation of WebSessionManager delegating to a WebSessionIdResolver for session id resolution and to a WebSessionStore.
